extendedInfo.description: Get the latest 2012 Presidential Election debate coverage, news, photos and more from this helpful app. This app brings together of all the web's best sources for 2012 coverage for easy enjoyment. Never be out of the loop around the water cooler!Tags: Barack Obama, 2012 election, Mitt Romney, Newt Gingrich, democrat, republican, election news, Ron Paul, Michele Bachmann

reviews.comment: What a joke! \nWhat is this crap? Badly written, misspelled pieces by anonymous mush-headed republikans. YECHHHH
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: excellent
reviews.comment: Good source of news for upcoming election!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Gossip
reviews.comment: This isn\'t presidential campaign info it\'s like reading a soap opera. Get some real news would you please.
reviews.author: A Google User
